name: Pumpkin Quest (Fruzmig)
description:
Pumpkin Quest is a mini RPG for the webcomic Jailbreak^2 but can be enjoyed as a stand-alone experience, keep in mind that this mostly exists as a test of RPG Maker as I was learning how to use the software while making it and it's supposed to be mostly comedic.

If you're here and are not a reader of the comic I'd love to hear your thoughts on the game, lol.
